entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Halifax (Shearwater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:41 p.m. ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shearwater Airport 9:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
Temperature: 5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 5.6°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle or showers. Risk of a thundershower early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
